reviewtext: Don't get me wrong as a handheld as long as your not close to any RFI source ,it's ok. But in my car...A 2005 cobalt ...its worthlessI spent extra money on a magnetic antenna, tried chokes and even bought a noise clipper, nothing made a difference. Then I tried the cheapest uniden handheld CB radio that I had under the same circumstances with the same equipment....antenna...etc.....and guess what no noise. So my advice ....buy a uniden Radio
